features.feature: 亲爱的用户，本次更新主要针对系统进行了优化，推荐您进行更新。

1. 本次更新会删除您的用户数据，请您在更新前做好数据备份。 2. 门店改制是特殊的OTA升级过程，由演示版本升级到商用版本过程中，系统会多次自动重启，在出现“开机导航”页面之前，请耐心等待，不要做恢厂等操作。 3. 更多精彩功能介绍，请访问“玩机技巧”应用。 4. 如果您在使用过程中遇到任何问题，请访问“我的荣耀”应用或访问荣耀官方服务网站 https://www.honor.com/cn/contact-us 寻求支持。
Dear user, this recommended update primarily focuses on system optimization.

1. Installing this update will erase your personal data. Please backup your data beforehand. 2. Version upgrade is a special OTA upgrade process. In the process of upgrading from demo version to commercial version, the system will restart automatically several times. Before "Startup navigation" screen appears, please wait patiently and do not operate the phone or restore it to factory settings. 3. Discover more information on product features in the Tips app. 4. If you encounter any issues during use, please get support by going to My HONOR or visiting our website: https://www.honor.com/cn/contact-us.
